  // Reduce scaling, add frequency tier boost, increase recency weight for improved adaptability
  double calculate_priority(uint64_t freq, uint64_t size) {
    constexpr double scaling = 1.1e5;
    constexpr double recency_boost = 12.0;
    double freq_tier_boost = (freq >= 4) ? 1.0 : 0.0;
    if (size == 0) {
      return pri_last_evict + (double)(freq) * scaling + recency_boost + freq_tier_boost;
    }
    return pri_last_evict + (double)(freq) * scaling / size + recency_boost + freq_tier_boost;
  }
